tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Hello sir my son was born on 18th Feb we had a very bad experience my son didn't cry when born failed vaccum and forceps he was diagnosed with birth aspaxia and hie later kept in nicu for 15 days they said he will have development issues and later we found that he was not looking at us then we checked his eye they said he had cvi .iam really at edge I just want to make my son's vision clear can you help us sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Dr. Dhanasekhar Kesavelu is incredible. Not only has he taken great care of my daughter health, but also he is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It’s rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend becoming his patient.
Well it would take sometime for me to put together my experience with Dr.Dhanasekhar kesavelu, My daughter now 3.5 yesr old, fom born to one year she was very good in allaspects, suddnly started tool passing isuue, not going to motion properly, she have hard, infrequent bowel movements that are often difficult or painful to pass. We visited local doctors they given some mdicines but the problem was same, I took my daughter nearest city to my town There Doctros done scanning, x-ray and they suggested some medicines and told if it is not clear may be need to go for surgery and they suspected  “Hirschsprung's disease”.
I was utter shockedgot about my daughter and sesrched in web for good and experienced doctors I found Dr.Dhanasekhar Sir. I took my daughter to Dhanasekahr Sir, in the first visit it self by seeing my baby he told baby suffering from functional constipation, nothng to worry, My mind relaxed once after hering doctor words, No need surgery. Dhnasekhar sir prescribed syrups and also asked us stop giving milk, we followed the same. Now my daughter is good with no issues and weight also gaining slowly.
I am highly thank full to you sir, 
I strongly recommended Dr.Dhanasekhar Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I came in for a consultation and clinic and staff are awesome, respectful and helpful...but the doctor is not like we've seen on videos... He wants us to educate all about the medicines.. I accept basics is fine *** ** ******* **** ** *** **** *******he is rude and instead of clarifying doubts in a call way he is just blaming us for not knowing information about medicine...he must know that we work in a sector where jobs are 12 to 14 hours per day will he can do our job in the time we do our medicine homework to meet you....and he just talks in order and if we cross he just shouts and insults us as have u not consulted with a doctor before and u should speak with me in a orderDear doctor we are layman in our field and we come there for doubts and clarification *** ** ****** ** **** **** ********* *** *** *** *** ***** **** ***** **** **** ** ******** ******** ****** ** ** **** **** ********* *** *** ******* *** ** ****** **** **** ******* *******..* ** **** ** ***** **** ********* **** **** **** ** **** **** ** **** ****** *** * ** *** **** ** ****** *** ***** ***** ******* ****** ** *** ***** ****..I understand he wants everyone to be aware of the information but that cannot be done by all layman like me..because we have other jobs too and that is why we come to people like you..******** ** ********** ***** ** ****** ** ***** *** ******* ******** ** *************** ********** *** *** ** **** **** *****..Never gonna visit this doctor ever

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited the clinic today for diet consultation for my daughter, who is 6 months old. I personally feel the doctor is in a hurry to complete the consultation or to see the next patient. He cooly said to watch his youtube videos for all diet related content, I didnt want to see videos as I am only interested in personal consultation for my kid. I paid fee of rs600 and travelled far to see him for personal Q and A and answer some anxious queries regarding food for my kid. This not the right way to approach any patient. **** ************** * ***** I wanted to see the doctor and not for watever so called his youtube videos. I wrote some 10 questions as a homework to ask him, but the way he responded and in a hurry to finish off the consultation, I couldnt ask my queries and got upset with this behaviour. It would be good if the doctor sees the patient in a rite way and give personalised and customised consultation to every kid. *** *** **** *** *** **** *** **** ******* **** *** ***** ** ***** **** * ***** **** ****** *** **** ***** *** ********** *** ** ********

tags: Wait time,Value for money,
review:
This is the theworst experience, it’s not enough that the doctor is good and clinic look excellent, ***** ****** ** **** ****** ***** ********* *** ********* 
My daughter was treated 2 days back(we waited for 1 hr), once I receive the test results I eagerly went to show the reports to the doctor to get further treatment and the watchman manhandled me not allowed me inside to show the reports, I don’t understand what this process in here, do they expect patients to wait even more time to show reports? . With this kind of attitude people(watchman) inside clinic I will never visit this clinic and even doesn’t suggest any one to visit this hospital. 

Doctor is good but that’s not enough, reception should also be good. In this corporate times, how you receive people is prior.
reply_text: I can understand your issue sir! Firstly no one gets man handled by anyone in my clinic that’s a very strong word. Nextly educated people like you should speak face to face when you Met me and not write negative online feedback like these. In corporate times people speak and address not write online and crib. I certainly don’t encourage this behaviour ( my staff according to you ) and you ( according to me). Come meet and speak let’s sort it out, that is if you want to……thanks for writing though….

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Started consulting Dr. Dhanashekar for my first born 4 years back and have continued with him even for my second child. I live in Arakkomam which is about 2 hours from Chennai and visiting and waiting very often with kids is a task, but he has made this so so so simple for me. Readily their to reply to the queries over messages and also to direct me for every little thing. I can't thank him enough for this and his treatment has worked miraculously for both be it for any small infection to major ones. He has the patience I haven't seen in any Doctor, let that be to explain anything to us or make the kids super friendly to him. My kids would recover just by visiting him or hearing from him. That's his magic! Sir thank you so much for rendering such lovely service to people. Ever grateful to you 🙏
reply_text:
God bless you! 
Overwhelmed and humbled by your feedback
Thanks a lot
Dr Dhanasekhar Kesavelu

review: My child was struggling with constipation after taking antibiotic for fever. Doctor heard my child history , diagnosed it correctly and prescribed medicines Without Side effects. I will recommend Dr.Dhanasekar as primary pediatrician for your child if possible or get his opinion atleast if you are worried about ongoing treatment. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am from Kolkata, My child was suffering with abdominal pain and some time she was passing stool with blood. I visited number of doctor but didn't get the root cause for my child problem. Initially , I took online appointment of Dr. Dhanasekhar and he asked me to come Apollo Children's Hospital , Chennai. I came here in Chennai this week and doctor did all necessary test. Finally ,  it was found that my child is suffering with constipation and some food allergy  . Doctor provided some minimal medicine  for those problems. I was very happy about the way how doctor diagnosis the problem. Doctor clear my all doubts. Sometime I asked same query multiple time as I was very scared and concerned about my child health but every time doctor answer my query without any irritation. Thank you Sir.
